description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Ever wanted to kill zombies with a Piranha launcher? Well now you can! Take on waves of the undead using some of the most ludicrous and over-the-top weapons zombies have ever seen! With over 70+ weapons in your arsenal, 5 playable characters, 2 different maps and local co-op, you're never short of ways to kill zombies with Dawn Of The Fred!
